group_1.textLeft: Oh, I wish I could have seen it♪@The instructor's adorable side!

group_1.textRight: Sounds like the sorta thing that'd be a total hit@on the back bulletin board of the school@or something, lmao.

group_1.textLeft: No, no! That's wrong, Miwa!@Lady San is already popular everywhere!
Can you stop that?@I mean, it's not true.
...Just so you guys know, that way of talking isn't for@anyone but the Youth Association and my family.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, alright, I getcha!
We'll keep that cuteness of yours a secret,@Instructor★

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you sure you really get it...?
Oh...@My stomach is growling...

group_1.textRight: Well, we did get a lot of exercise today.
Then let's stop by the convenience store to get@something for everyone!

group_1.textLeft: I shall treat you to that then.

group_1.textRight: What...@You are...?!

group_1.textLeft: This isn't just a treat. I'm also offering an apology@for yesterday here...

group_1.textRight: Whaaat?@Don't act so distant, Instructor!

group_1.textLeft: ...It's not only an apology.
I've seen everyone grow this time, and I'd like to@reward you all for that.

group_1.textRight: I can't believe that Lady San is giving me a reward...
Even though, for Miyu, it's enough just seeing@Lady San's hallowed legs...
...Might be better to pretend we didn't hear that...

group_1.textLeft: Miyu, Miwa and Sasha, you can buy@whatever you want as well.
I know I've worried you guys a lot.

group_1.textRight: Well, then, I'll just help myself to it...

group_1.textLeft: ...But only up to 300 yen per person...

group_1.narration: ―Shigure―@This might be the first time I'm eating@at a convenience store with everyone...
―Hagumu―@It feels special... and it's nice to have@something like this once in a while.
―Himena―@Hey, hey, Instructor. So this parfait you're so crazy into,@is it the one you always eat?
―San―@Well, I just happen to know it's good.
―San―@Since I had my big bro from the Youth Association@buy it for me before...

group_1.textLeft: Sorry to keep you waiting.

group_1.textRight: Thanks for the food, Instructor, lol.

group_1.textLeft: You're welcome.
I'll treat you again after our next bootcamp.

group_1.textRight: What...@We have to do this training... again?

group_1.textLeft: Naturally.
Even though you have overcome some of your@weaknesses, there are still things I want to teach you.

group_1.textRight: Ugh... Right...
Waaah, you're gonna make me cry...@Guess I'm no match for you after all...
But! Next time, I'm gonna do my very best@and totally blow your mind!

group_1.textLeft: For the sake of Neo-Magius...@I also wanna be strong...!

group_1.textRight: I want to get praised by the Instructor again...@Gotta work hard...!
Next time I'm gonna participate in the training@until the end!

group_1.textLeft: Then, then!
I'll help you as your right-hand man again,@Lady San!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*♪@Everyone's full of motivation, huh?

group_1.textLeft: How reassuring.
(Even if we lose heart, even if we fall...)
(As long as we have this much determination@to grow, we can still aim upwards...)
(Even the top will surely be within our reach...!)
(For that to happen, I have to make everyone@stronger.)
B-T-W, Miyurin, when's the next Youth Association@meeting gonna be?

group_1.textRight: About that, about that!@Is there something you want to do?

group_1.textLeft: Nothing, just wondering how the Instructor's@spending her time with her big bros there.
Last time I went, you seemed to have@hidden it well...
I wanna see it for real once.

group_1.textRight: ...Actually, I'm kinda curious too.

group_1.textLeft: If you don't mind, maybe we could all go visit?
...We might see something scary, though...

group_1.textRight: What should we do...?

group_1.textCenter: ...Looks like SOME girls here want to train@in detention.

group_1.textLeft: Kyaha★
